commit-message: Initial commit of james mailbox web site project. git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/james/mailbox/trunk@1027054 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

remove MBean stuff from copier and change the interface to take src and dst MailboxManager's as parameter git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/james/mailbox/trunk@1053106 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Use 0.2-M2-SNAPSHOT for imap as temp solution for dependency cycle between imap and mailbox before real solution git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/james/mailbox/trunk@1056427 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
Remove dependencies to mailbox-integration-tester in mailbox projects (MAILBOX-28) git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/james/mailbox/trunk@1056654 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Add a new interface called MessageSearchIndex and an implementation which use lucene to index messages and make it possible to search within a mailbox in a performant way. This is just the first part of it as we need to think about howto invoke the MessageSearchIndex. See MAILBOX-10 git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/james/mailbox/trunk@1070933 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
